title: CS Competency Practical Enhancement: Online Modules and Role-Play for Training Smoking Cessation Counseling Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design counseling scenarios by applying the 5-stage smoking cessation model (5As)
Learners can analyze clients’ conditions using the Fagerström Test for Nicotine Dependence
Learners can execute smoking cessation facilitation techniques (motivational enhancement, action planning, etc.) with over 80% accuracy in field settings through online modules and role-playing
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
